content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you considering to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I'm looking for a place that is affordable. I saw that your apartment is in the city center, and it is 50 square meters big. I think a reasonable price for this apartment would be 600 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 600 Euros is much lower than the market value for an apartment of this size and location. The city center is a prime location, and I'm sure you're aware that prices are higher here. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the property. How about 900 Euros per month? This is a competitive price considering the amenities and the convenience of the location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more like it. Considering it is an unfurnished apartment, I think we can find a middle ground. How about 750 euros per month? It's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 750 Euros is still below what I'm willing to accept. As I mentioned, this is a brand-new apartment in the heart of the city, and it's close to all amenities. A price of 850 Euros per month would be more in line with the market value. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet this price, I'm sorry, but I'll have to reconsider our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a reasonable price. Considering the location and the fact that it's unfurnished, I agree to the price of 850 euros per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month! Let's proceed with the lease agreement. Would you like to sign a one-year lease or a two-year lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would prefer a two-year lease. It will give me more stability as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Fine, a two-year lease is acceptable. I'll prepare the lease agreement for you to sign. We'll also need to discuss the deposit and any additional fees. Would you like to do that now, or would you prefer to discuss it later?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's discuss it now. I would like to know all the costs involved before we move forward.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly. The deposit for the apartment will be two months' rent, so that's 1700 Euros. Additionally, there's a one-time administrative fee of 300 Euros. This fee covers the cost of setting up the utilities in your name and any initial paperwork. There are no other additional fees. Once you sign the lease and pay the deposit and administrative fee, we can proceed with the move-in process. Does this sound acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, that sounds acceptable. I agree to the conditions you have stated.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent. Since we have agreed on all terms, I will prepare the lease agreement for you to sign. We will also need to schedule a time for you to come by and pay the deposit and administrative fee. Once that's done, we can finalize everything and you can move in. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we conclude our meeting?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I don't have any further questions. Thank you for your time and for being so accommodating. I look forward to signing the lease and moving in.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Maryam. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I'll send you an email with the lease agreement attached. Please review it and let me know if you have any questions. We can then arrange a time for you to come by and complete the payment. Congratulations on your new apartment!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you! I look forward to moving into my new apartment. Let's schedule the appointment for next Monday at 10 am.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Fantastic! I'll see you next Monday at 10 am. Please bring a copy of your passport or ID as well as the necessary funds for the deposit and administrative fee. I'll have the lease agreement ready for you to sign. See you then!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: See you then! By the way, my name is Maryam Abbasi, not Maryam.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Apologies for the confusion, Maryam. I'll make sure to have everything in order for you on Monday. See you at 10 am!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Maryam. Have a great week ahead! See you Monday.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: See you Monday!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: See you then! If you have any questions or need to reschedule, feel free to contact me. Have a good week!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
